search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Dotloop (dotloop.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Dotloop can be found at: [https://www.dotloop.com/pricing/](https://www.dotloop.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

![Image 11: Company Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/4d4b031e-17e9-4e02-9d27-8ee6b9c52464/44d5a92d-232b-4857-a878-6b8ae0af804f/a09c6e9f-2cd2-4b86-bc25-d8471d5a5a75/dotloop-logo.png)

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

*   ### Overview
    
*   ### Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
*   ### Performance Cookies
    
*   ### Functional Cookies
    
*   ### Advertising Cookies
    

#### Overview

When you visit our website, we or our third-party partners may store or retrieve information on your browser, mainly through cookies. We use this information to make the site function as you expect, to track analytics and provide a more personalized web experience, to personalize ads and measure the success of our marketing campaigns and similar activities as described in our Privacy Notice.

You can choose not to allow certain types of cookies. Click on the tab for each category of cookies to learn more and adjust your preferences. You cannot opt-out of certain types of cookies that are needed in order to ensure the proper functioning of our website.

**Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information.** Under certain privacy laws, you have the right to direct a business not to "sell" or “share” your personal information, including for targeted advertising purposes. Please visit the “Advertising Cookies” tab on the left to opt-out of our third-party partners collecting your information through cookies for targeted advertising purposes.

To learn more about our privacy practices, please visit our  
[Privacy Notice](https://showingtimeplus.com/privacy)

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies Active

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies Active

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Advertising Cookies

 Advertising Cookies Active

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant ads on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will receive the same number of ads, but they may be less relevant to you.

### Cookie List

Consent Leg.Interest

extracted_content.content:
Complete Solutions for Real Estate Professionals
------------------------------------------------

### Whether you’re a real estate [broker](https://www.dotloop.com/products/plans-pricing/#broker) recruiting top talent, a [team leader](https://www.dotloop.com/products/plans-pricing/#team) simplifying compliance or an [agent](https://www.dotloop.com/products/plans-pricing/#agent) wanting to close deals with a single app, dotloop acts as your virtual real estate assistant, empowering you with the only transaction management tools you need to succeed

Agents

$31.99/month

*    ![Image 1](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Unlimited Transactions**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Use as many transaction as you want.
    
*    ![Image 2](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Robust Document EditorQuickly fill out PDFs you upload or load in some of our ready-to-use templates.
    
*    ![Image 3](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Secure and Legal eSignaturesChoose the solution trusted by banks, brokerages, and hundreds of thousands of professionals
    
*    ![Image 4](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) MLS and Association FeedsDotloop has partnered with 190+ local and state associations to provide you with comprehensive forms coverage in addition to hundreds of MLS feeds.
    
*    ![Image 5](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Audit TrailStay compliant with a complete record of every action taken during the transaction.
    
*    ![Image 6](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Secured BackupBank-grade encryption. World-class protection.
    
*    ![Image 7](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) SMS Texting Communications**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Edit, share, view and sign documents via text with full tracking of all activity.
    
*    ![Image 8](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) In-Person SigningEasily have clients eSign from your mobile device or computer
    
*    ![Image 9](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Real-Time NotificationsStay in the loop with instant email and push notifications that can be customized.
    
*    ![Image 10](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Mobile AppAccess dotloop on the go from iOS or Android devices
    
*    ![Image 11](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Document ScannerThe dotloop app turns your phone into a mobile scanner - converting pictures into editable PDFs.
    
*    ![Image 12](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Easy-Offer LinksEasily share secure, public links to a set of offer documents for any of your listings.
    
*    ![Image 13](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Split and Rotate PDFsHave one massive file with multiple pages? Upload it to dotloop and easily split it into separate documents.
    
*    ![Image 14](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) IntegrationsConnect dotloop with over 75 real estate platforms through seamless integrations
    
*    ![Image 15](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Document TemplatesSetup your own reusable documents. Save common contract clauses to save time.
    
*    ![Image 16](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Task Templates**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Setup your own reusable task lists.
    
*    ![Image 17](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Clause Manager**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Store commonly used real estate contract clauses and save time.
    
*    ![Image 18](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Add-to-Team**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Provide same-level access to other people within a specific transaction
    
*    ![Image 19](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Include PDF Attachments**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Include a PDF version of any document when sharing with others.
    
*    ![Image 20](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Online Faxing**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Easily fax documents directly from dotloop.
    
*    ![Image 21](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) VIP Phone and Email Support**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Phone and email support 7 days a week. Extensive knowledgebase with instant answers.
    
*    ![Image 22](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Unlimited Participants**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Invite as many people as you need to the loop (transaction).
    
*    ![Image 23](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Custom Invite Message**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Personalize the welcome email when inviting people to a transaction.
    
*    ![Image 24](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Invite Service Providers**PREMIUM FEATURE ONLY**  
    Seamlessly include all your Trusted Service Providers to the transactions and natively introduce them to your clients at the right time.
    

Teams

Contact Us

*    ![Image 25](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Unlimited TransactionsUse as many loops as you want for your online transactions
    
*    ![Image 26](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Robust Document EditorQuickly fill out PDFs you upload or load in some of our ready-to-use templates
    
*    ![Image 27](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Secure and Legal eSignaturesChoose the solution trusted by banks, brokerages, and hundreds of thousands of professionals
    
*    ![Image 28](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) MLS and Association FeedsDotloop has partnered with 190+ local and state associations to provide you with comprehensive forms coverage in addition to hundreds of MLS feeds.
    
*    ![Image 29](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Audit TrailStay compliant with a complete record of every action taken during the transaction.
    
*    ![Image 30](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) Secured BackupBank-grade encryption. World-class protection. Verified by 3rd party auditors.
    
*    ![Image 31](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) SMS Texting CommunicationsEdit, share, view and sign documents via text with full tracking of all activity.
    
*    ![Image 32](https://www.dotloop.com/wp-content/themes/dotloop/assets/img/icon-info.png) In-Person SigningEasily have clients eSign from your mobile device or computer

Dotloop Frequently Asked Questions
----------------------------------

Dotloop is the only complete real estate transaction management software that enables brokers, agents, transaction coordinators and clients to collaborate in a virtual environment.

Our software solution handles the entire deal from offer to close. And because dotloop touches all stages of the transaction, it gives your team real-time visibility into your entire business.

Whenever you use a point solution for a specific stage of a real estate transaction - such as a solution for eSign or for compliance and storage - dotloop is the virtual real estate assistant that cobbles together multiple point solutions to handle the other stages of the deal. Dotloop can handle the complexity, as well as data integrity and security risks, making it the only holistic transaction management solution on the market.

**Think about it this way:** Today, your smartphone is your GPS, calculator, camera, notepad, flashlight and much more - all in one device, which makes your life so much easier.

In a similar manner, dotloop gives you eSignatures, a robust document editor, online storage, compliance, reporting and much more. This is is to help you avoid having to connect multiple systems to complete the transaction management process.

To learn more about why dotloop is leading transaction management software for real estate professionals, check out [dotloop.com/value](https://www.dotloop.com/value/).

Certainly! With dotloop, you can create up to 10 free real estate transactions and access all the essential tools to deliver a superior client experience:

*   Access MLS and Association forms
*   Download the free mobile app (iOS and Android)
*   Edit, share, eSign and store documents
*   Manage task lists
*   Track interactions with a real-time activity log and more!

Create [a free dotloop account](https://www.dotloop.com/#/signup) today!

[Dotloop Business+](https://www.dotloop.com/brokers/) is the perfect solution for a real estate brokerage. Gain real-time visibility into all deals, create custom review stages and standardized transactions with custom loop templates to make compliance fast and easy. A broker dashboard also streamlines communication with agents and teams while empowering them with all the benefits from a dotloop Premium account so they can deliver a great client experience.

Take advantage of our [10-minute discovery call](https://www.dotloop.com/demo/) to schedule a demo and to get a personalized quote.

[Dotloop for Teams](https://www.dotloop.com/teams/) offers the ability to “act on behalf” of your agents while tracking who completed what action. Custom templates and automated workflows allow the team to get deals done seamlessly, while team-specific branding helps to build your business and instill confidence with clients. Dotloop for Teams gives your team the control and collaboration to operate like a brokerage.

Take advantage of our [10-minute discovery call](https://www.dotloop.com/products/plans-pricing/#demo) to schedule a demo and get a personalized quote for the best dotloop pricing and plan for your business.

[Dotloop Premium](https://www.dotloop.com/premium/?medium=page-pricing&campaign=premium-web) gives you unlimited transactions (loops), Task Templates, phone support, Text Messenger, clause manager and much more.

You can unlock dotloop Premium at [$31.99/month](https://www.dotloop.com/buy/premium/?medium=page-pricing&campaign=premium-web) or save with a yearly subscription of [$314/year](https://www.dotloop.com/buy/premium/?medium=page-pricing&campaign=premium-web&TermLength=annual) (18% off).

The complete real estate transaction management software that equips brokers, agents, teams and clients with virtual collaboration tools. Review Dotloop plans and pricing.
